name: Super Rock Blasters!
description: Ready up a space ship and destroy your friends in this frenetic multiplayer Asteroids reimagining! In Super Rock Blasters, up to 4 players will wheel around space rocks, dodge ricocheting bullets and blast each other into tiny neon colored giblets.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+ Processor: SSE2 instruction set support Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: Stereo Output Additional Notes: Controller(s) Recommended
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+ Processor: SSE2 instruction set support Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: Stereo Output Additional Notes: Controller(s) recommended
